Featured Snacks

Wire up a SegmentedBar

Nathan Walker shows us how to wire up a SegmentedBar.

Theme Switching in NativeScript

Ben Elliott shows us how to add theme switching to your NativeScript app.

Using Chrome Tabs for Android

Brad Martin gives you the lowdown on Chrome tabs, which launch web content on Android without relying on a webview.

Upgrade your NativeScript Installation

Upgrade your NativeScript installation and update your app to support it. Short and sweet.

Animations In NativeScript

In this episode, TJ Vantoll shows you how to easily create and control animations and animation timings via the NativeScript animate API.

Using Sass and Less in NativeScript

In this episode, Todd Anglin goes over how to add built-in support for Sass and Less to your NativeScript project.

More Than a Snack

Need an appetizer? Learn how NativeScript works

What's this all about?

NativeScript Snacks are bite-sized videos that teach you more than you ever wanted to know about NativeScript, all in a tiny, digestible, healthy format.
